Translations.Text: Gedha s Win Ibbwin amdan iS, d iminig n yiv, si Loamaa n Leaoam, ar Loamaa ibaaden mavi, ideg Neoqa i as d izzin, iwakken ad as Nessken, seg issekniyen nne£. Ih, Neppa, d Win Isellen, Ipwalin
Nefka Tazmamt i Musa, u Nerra p d nnhaya i At Isoail. "Ur saut awkil, war Nek
D tarwa n wid i Nebbwi akked Nue. Neppa, s tidep, d amdan isnemmiren
Nsseyya di Tezmamt, i At Isoail: "war ccekk, a ppesfesdem, di tmurt, berdayen, u aias ara tesme$woem iman nnwen
Mi d iusa usefsed amenzu segsen, Nuzen awen d imdanen nne£, s loehd uqsie, kecmen ixxamen; lemaahda tevoa
Sinna, Nerra d ppao nnwen, segsen. Nebbwi yawen d ayla, tarwa. Nesiuqqet iasekoiwen nnwen
Ma tmaanem, i iman nnwen, ma tdensem, i iman nnwen. Mi d tusa lemaahda taneggarut, ssexven udmawen nnwen, kecmen Loamaa, akken i t kecmen abrid amenzu; hudden, wakali, ayen is ipzuxxun
Ahat Mass nnwen ad Ieun fellawen. Ma tulsem, a Nales. Nerra Loahennama d leebs i ijehliyen
Ih, Leqwoan agi inehhu ar wayen iweqmen mavi, ibecceo lmumnin i ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar i nitni akafi meqqwoen

Amdan issawal i cceoo, akken issawal i lxio. Amdan izga d aeemmaq

Nerra, iv akked wass, d sin issekniyen. Assekni n yiv Nerra d tellis, Nerra win n wass d win ipwalin, iwakken a pnadim lfevl n Mass nnwen, a ppissinem amvan iseggwasen, akked leesab. Yal ta$awsa, Nfeuuel ip akken iwata
I yal amdan, Ncudd as lbext is s amgarv is. Ass n tnekra, ad as d Nessuffe$ tazmamt ara iaf teldi

Win ipwanhan, i iman is kan, win innetlafen, innetlaf mgal iman is kan. Ur ipbibbi yiwen taakkwemt n wayev. Ur Nekkat, alamma Nuzen amazan
Ma Neb$a a Nesqucc tamdint, Neppak lameo i isaiyen is, ad xedmen, degs, cceoo. Ad iaaddi fellas Wawal, a p Nhudd wakali
Aceal n tsuta ay Nesqucc, deffir Nue! Ad Iqadd Mass ik, i tussna akked tmeeoiwt ibekkaven n imdanen iS
Win ib$an taeemmaqt, Nezzazzal as degs, i £ ihwan, i win i £ Neb$a. Sinna, Nerra yas Loahennama ad din io$, indell, ippuveggeo
Win ib$an laxeot, iaazem fellas yal laazem, u neppa iumen; widak, tajmilt i laazem nnsen
I akw, i wigi d wiyav, Nwessaa tikci s$uo Mass ik. Tikci n Mass ik, ur meedudet
Wali amek Nesmenyaf kra i wiyav. War ccekk, di laxeot, lfeoq d usmenyef, ad ilin sennig waya
